name: My Dear Kitsune Forever!
description:
My Dear Kitsune Forever! 

A remake/DLC/sequel to a free computer game called My Dear Kitsune. Despite it's cute art style, it's very disturbing as it's a horror game, and not suitable for those who are easily disturbed by violence.

In addition to the original story, the graphics and music have been updated, as well as a longer story with brand new endings and more characters!

If you couldn't tell already, I'm Sakura, a human girl who wears cat ears as a disguise! Why would I need a disguise? I'm pure human in a no-pure-humans school! 

In this game, you will get to know:
  • Kitsune, the class star!
  • Natsumi, a cheerful tanuki!
  • Lori, an equally cheerful lorikeet!
  • Okami, a mysterious dog!
  • Majo, a wizard who's a goat!
  • Hotaru, a firefly from space!
  • And me, Sakura, of course!

So  please, watch the happiness, horror, and despair unfold. I'll be waiting on the secret island right here on earth, Kemono Island.

How do I download the game?

First, you will want to download the files. You will want the file for your computer (Windows, for example). Next, extract the file you chose, and open the folder. You will now want to find the application, and open it. Yay! You can start playing the game now!
